2754.name: Island Inn
description: This is the lobby of the Island Inn, a small and comfortable
place to stay.  Potted palms sit to either side of a nice
couch and a table sits before the couch, laden with magazines.
To the north of the room is a wooden desk where the clerk
sits with a guest book for visitors to log themselves in.

2739.name: Among the Trees
description: The rain forest stretches out before you.  An {Gemer{gal{^d g{Gree{gn {GCano{^p{Gy{0
of leaves can be see far up above you, blocking out all of the sun's
rays and making it almost impossible to see.  Makou lights are
positioned on some of the brownish gray trees that make up pretty much
all of the terrain, allowing for some sight, or at least enough to see
who your supposed to tag.  The forest floor is filled with leaves and
feces of the animals that still live here, and the air smells dank and
wet.  Every few minutes or so the sky will let loose and spray water
everywhere, since this is indeed a rain forest, and it lives up to its
name.  The calls of birds can be heard up in the trees ,and the sounds
of crickets is in your ears perpetually as you trudge through the
leaves, cracking and crinkling as you walk.

2784.name: The Beach Walk [North Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2731.name: Among the Trees
description: The rain forest stretches out before you.  An {Gemer{gal{^d g{Gree{gn {GCano{^p{Gy{0
of leaves can be see far up above you, blocking out all of the sun's

2707.name: Outside the Hotel
description: The hotel stands to north, only two stories tall with a large
lighthouse on top of it.  All around you is tropical trees and
vegitation.  Tourist walk around enjoying the scenery, and having fun.
To the north is the Hotel, and to the south is the Road and Beach.  To
the west is the walk around the island.

2743.name: Among the trees
description: The rain forest stretches out before you.  An {Gemer{gal{^d g{Gree{gn {GCano{^p{Gy{0
of leaves can be see far up above you, blocking out all of the sun's
rays and making it almost impossible to see.  Makou lights are
positioned on some of the brownish gray trees that make up pretty much
all of the terrain, allowing for some sight, or at least enough to see

name.  The calls of birds can be heard up in the trees ,and the sounds
of crickets is in your ears perpetually as you trudge through the
leaves, cracking and crinkling as you walk.

2715.name: Vince's Paradise Casino
description: You have entered Paradise Island's resident casino.  The
surroundings are necessarily tacky, since this is a casino afterall.
Palm trees growing out of greenish pots filled with dirt grow along
the corners of the room, and the ceiling is filled with creeper vines
and stuffed monkeys.  A sign is before the room to your north with a
large pot of gold and a palm tree.  It Proclaims, "Game Rooms" on it.
To your south is a dirt path.

2746.name: Among the Trees
description: The rain forest stretches out before you.  An {Gemer{gal{^d g{Gree{gn {GCano{^p{Gy{0
of leaves can be see far up above you, blocking out all of the sun's
rays and making it almost impossible to see.  Makou lights are
positioned on some of the brownish gray trees that make up pretty much
all of the terrain, allowing for some sight, or at least enough to see

2794.name: The Beach Walk [West Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2789.name: The Beach Walk [North Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2760.name: pet shop place
description: lalalalalalalalala

2775.name: The Beach Walk [North Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway

description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2759.name: Bay 1
description: You stand to one side of the boat house, a large bay filled with
water is what is in here, nothing more.

2797.name: The Beach Walk [West Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2720.name: Vince's Eatery
description: You have entered the Casino's restaurant.  The Tables are wreathed
in green table clothes which depict a full scale view of Paradise
Island.  The food smells quite good and most of it from what you can
see on people's plates, is shaped into the images of rain forest
animals.  Creeper vines and palm trees grow along the walls and plastic
toucans sit atop the edges of the tables.

2748.name: Among the Trees
description: The rain forest stretches out before you.  An {Gemer{gal{^d g{Gree{gn {GCano{^p{Gy{0
of leaves can be see far up above you, blocking out all of the sun's
rays and making it almost impossible to see.  Makou lights are
positioned on some of the brownish gray trees that make up pretty much
all of the terrain, allowing for some sight, or at least enough to see

2788.name: The Beach Walk [North Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2730.name: Among the Trees
description: The rain forest stretches out before you.  An {Gemer{gal{^d g{Gree{gn {GCano{^p{Gy{0
of leaves can be see far up above you, blocking out all of the sun's
rays and making it almost impossible to see.  Makou lights are
positioned on some of the brownish gray trees that make up pretty much
all of the terrain, allowing for some sight, or at least enough to see

name.  The calls of birds can be heard up in the trees ,and the sounds
of crickets is in your ears perpetually as you trudge through the
leaves, cracking and crinkling as you walk.

2700.name: On The Docks Of Paradise Island
description: You stand on the wooden docks of a large, tropical island.  Palm Trees
extend over the whole island, and the sun comes down burning hot.  You see
people, almost naked walking on the island, the heat being so hot.  The
waters of the Sea Of Swords here are a pure blue, calm and clear.  You see
several people on the beach taking a nice swim.  As you look to the east,
you see nothing but beach and people, having fun.  A dirst road goes
northwards into the island.

2793.name: The Beach Walk [West Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2705.name: Paradise Square
description: You stand at Paradise Square, the focal point of the island.  Here many
of the places can be walked to, and many others stand here to meet and
speak.  To the north, the large Paradise Island Arena stands, the cheers of
battle come from within.  To the south, you see people, laying out almost
dead, getting a tan and having fun.  To the east, a road block is in the
way, but you can see people are working on the newest Resort here.

2703.name: The Welcome Wagon
description: Welcome To Paradise Island, The Player Resort.  You stand in the main fun
area of the whole world, and the best known.  We hope you enjoy your stay
here, with Paradise Island's many beachs, clubs and resorts.  You will find
that Murder and Attacking each other is NOT allowed here, but only in the
arena.  We hope your stay here in Paradise Island is something you won't
forget.

2727.name: Among the Trees
description: The rain forest stretches out before you.  An {Gemer{gal{^d g{Gree{gn {GCano{^p{Gy{0
of leaves can be see far up above you, blocking out all of the sun's
rays and making it almost impossible to see.  Makou lights are
positioned on some of the brownish gray trees that make up pretty much
all of the terrain, allowing for some sight, or at least enough to see
who your supposed to tag.  The forest floor is filled with leaves and
feces of the animals that still live here, and the air smells dank and
wet.  Every few minutes or so the sky will let loose and spray water
everywhere, since this is indeed a rain forest, and it lives up to its
name.  The calls of birds can be heard up in the trees ,and the sounds
of crickets is in your ears perpetually as you trudge through the
leaves, cracking and crinkling as you walk.

2709.name: Stairs to the Upstairs
description: The room opens up to reveal a staircase going upstairs.  There is
nothing to special here.

2785.name: The Beach Walk [North Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2702.name: The Road To The Resort
description: You are walking along the road to the Resort.  To the east you see an
archway begining to rise.  To the southwest, a large dock stands, with a
ship at bay, waiting.

2721.name: Paradise Island Bank
description: You walk into a small room, in which a single bank teller sits
behind the window of the bank.  The room is filled with a few tables
and some paintings, that is about it.

2774.name: The Beach Walk [North Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2725.name: Before the Rain Forest
description: You are standing before the edge of a massive expanse of forest.
The canopy stretches out far into the distance, and you cannot even
see what is under it, because the green blocks the sun's rays.  A
metal fence blocks the way to the trees, seemingly going all the way
around them.  A small, plump man stands before the gate of the fence,
beaming broadly, and wearing a Paradise Island T-Shirt.  There a sign
in the distance although you can't quite make make out what it says,
something about tag.

2783.name: The Beach Walk [North Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2753.name: Among the Trees
description: The rain forest stretches out before you.  An {Gemer{gal{^d g{Gree{gn {GCano{^p{Gy{0
of leaves can be see far up above you, blocking out all of the sun's
rays and making it almost impossible to see.  Makou lights are
positioned on some of the brownish gray trees that make up pretty much
all of the terrain, allowing for some sight, or at least enough to see
who your supposed to tag.  The forest floor is filled with leaves and
feces of the animals that still live here, and the air smells dank and
wet.  Every few minutes or so the sky will let loose and spray water
everywhere, since this is indeed a rain forest, and it lives up to its
name.  The calls of birds can be heard up in the trees ,and the sounds
of crickets is in your ears perpetually as you trudge through the
leaves, cracking and crinkling as you walk.

2722.name: A Sunny Dirt Path
description: You are walking down a sunny dirt path along the greatest resort
town in the realms, Paradise Island.  The sound of waves crashing up
against the shore and the golden sun splashing through the palm trees
makes for a relaxing atmosphere.  Seagulls fly happily up overhead and
you can see small shops and buildings to your north and south.  West
goes further along the path, as does east.

2757.name: The Beach Walk [South Side]
description: The tropical air surrounds you on the walkway along the shore.  The
beach is here, and surrounds most of the island.  To the east you can
see a large boat house.  Back west is the main part of the island.

2717.name: A Game Room
description: Slot machines spread out in rows all along the walls and edges of
this spacious game room.  The greenish brown carpet is stained with
all sorts of muddy shoe prints and the crush of bodys is overwhelming.
Cheers of people who got the jackpot and the screams of people who
lost envelope the atmosphere here, upping your adrenaline level.  The
Owner of the Casino, Vince, has an office to the north, and east is
the eatery.  South leads back to the center of the game rooms.

2745.name: Among the Trees
description: The rain forest stretches out before you.  An {Gemer{gal{^d g{Gree{gn {GCano{^p{Gy{0
of leaves can be see far up above you, blocking out all of the sun's
rays and making it almost impossible to see.  Makou lights are
positioned on some of the brownish gray trees that make up pretty much
all of the terrain, allowing for some sight, or at least enough to see
who your supposed to tag.  The forest floor is filled with leaves and
feces of the animals that still live here, and the air smells dank and
wet.  Every few minutes or so the sky will let loose and spray water
everywhere, since this is indeed a rain forest, and it lives up to its
name.  The calls of birds can be heard up in the trees ,and the sounds
of crickets is in your ears perpetually as you trudge through the
leaves, cracking and crinkling as you walk.

2701.name: The Road To The Resort
description: Your walking onto a road, leading to the Paradise Island resort.  You see
some bakini women walking on the road, talking and giggling.  To the east,
you see the road goes under an archway, and into the resort area.  The palm
trees around you sway in the wind, calm and nice.

2767.name: The Beach Walk [East Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2704.name: The Road To The Resort
description: The Resort.  People walking by you, talking, walking, swimming.  You can
see the whole resort here, covered in palm trees and beachs.  The warm sun
above is good, and the feel of safty lies around.  The road goes eastwards
to Paradise Square, or back west to the Welcome Wagon.

2770.name: The Beach Walk [East Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2708.name: Paradise Island Hotel
description: The hotel of the island stands before you, a regular looking hotel
that is on an tropical island.  A large desk stands to the north with
the hotel clerk behind it.  The room is filled with falk palm trees
and other tropical stuff.  A few chairs and stuff lie around.  A door
to the north leads to the rooms.

2764.name: The Beach Walk [East Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2804.name: Paradise Hotel Room 5
description: You stand inside one of the rooms of the hotel.  The entire room is
very well dressed in furniture and paintings.  A large bed big enough
for three sits next to large windows overlooking the tropical island.
A large oak desk stands again one wall, opposite a large vanity mirror
and dresser.  Curtains hang down from the bed and windows, and
everything looks so tropical.

2719.name: A Game Room
description: You are standing in one of the many game rooms offered at Vince's
Paradise Casino.  Cheers and agonizing screams can be heard quite
easily from here since you are standing in the middle of the dicing
room.  Tons of dice tables are set out, palm fronds and plastic
insects covering their outsides, and men dressed in tacky green suits
manning them.  Many different people of all different races line up
around the tables, and cram close to someone whose luck is running
high.  East is back to the center of the rooms.

2782.name: The Beach Walk [North Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2779.name: The Beach Walk [North Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2780.name: The Beach Walk [North Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2710.name: The Beach Walk [West Side]
description: The hotel stands to the east.  All around you the tropical air
flows past you, the palm trees sway in the wind a tad.  The blue
waters of the Sea of Swords laps up against the ocean beach.  The
sandy path continues its course around the island.

2768.name: The Beach Walk [East Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2772.name: The Beach Walk [East Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around

2796.name: The Beach Walk [West Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway

leaves, cracking and crinkling as you walk.

2723.name: Happy Soboko's Store of Wonder
description: You have entered a small grass hut that looks as though it caters
to tourists.  Pipes hang from metal hooks attached to the walls, and
top quality weed is sold up near the counter.  The smell of this place
is enough to make any pothead squeal with glee, and it doesn't take a
rocket scientist to figure out that the grass this place is made out
of, is weed as well.  The only exit is north back to the dirt path.

2713.name: The Welcome Wagon
description: Welcome To Paradise Island, The Player Resort.  You stand in the main fun
area of the whole world, and the best known.  We hope you enjoy your stay
here, with Paradise Island's many beachs, clubs and resorts.  You will find
that Murder and Attacking each other is NOT allowed here, but only in the
arena.  We hope your stay here in Paradise Island is something you won't
forget.

2733.name: Among the Trees
description: The rain forest stretches out before you.  An {Gemer{gal{^d g{Gree{gn {GCano{^p{Gy{0
of leaves can be see far up above you, blocking out all of the sun's
rays and making it almost impossible to see.  Makou lights are
positioned on some of the brownish gray trees that make up pretty much

name.  The calls of birds can be heard up in the trees ,and the sounds
of crickets is in your ears perpetually as you trudge through the
leaves, cracking and crinkling as you walk.

2756.name: The Blue Team Ready Room
description: You are standing in the blue team ready room.  Team badges are
layed out for the use of your team mates.  All the walls are red, and
there is a large door to your east, which will be opened

2751.name: Among the Trees
description: The rain forest stretches out before you.  An {Gemer{gal{^d g{Gree{gn {GCano{^p{Gy{0
of leaves can be see far up above you, blocking out all of the sun's
rays and making it almost impossible to see.  Makou lights are
positioned on some of the brownish gray trees that make up pretty much
all of the terrain, allowing for some sight, or at least enough to see
who your supposed to tag.  The forest floor is filled with leaves and
feces of the animals that still live here, and the air smells dank and
wet.  Every few minutes or so the sky will let loose and spray water
everywhere, since this is indeed a rain forest, and it lives up to its
name.  The calls of birds can be heard up in the trees ,and the sounds
of crickets is in your ears perpetually as you trudge through the
leaves, cracking and crinkling as you walk.

2716.name: The Center of the Game Rooms
description: Dice tables and slot machines line the room, and tacky decorations
rule the building as you walk through Vince's Casino.  The floor is
painted a bright green that sort of hurts your ears, but what really
catches your attention is the annoying animal sounds.  They're blasted
from some sort of speaker in the wall amplified probably by a wizard,
and they sound horrible.  Palm fronds and plastic animals decorate the
walls and ceilings, and gaming opportunitys are every which way.
North, south and east, and west are game rooms.  South is back to the
entrance

2777.name: The Beach Walk [North Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2800.name: Upstairs in the Hotel
description: The second floor for of the hotel.  Doors stand on either side of
the wall, north and south.  Each room numbered.  The hallway continues
to the west.  To the north the door reads "Room 5".  To the south the
door reads "Room 6".

2802.name: Paradise Hotel Room 2
description: You stand inside one of the rooms of the hotel.  The entire room is
very well dressed in furniture and paintings.  A large bed big enough
for three sits next to large windows overlooking the tropical island.
A large oak desk stands again one wall, opposite a large vanity mirror
and dresser.  Curtains hang down from the bed and windows, and
everything looks so tropical.

2773.name: The Beach Walk [East Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2787.name: The Beach Walk [North Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2755.name: The Red Team Ready Room
description: You are standing in the red team ready room.  Team badges are layed
out for the use of your team mates.  All the walls are red, and there
is a large door to your east, which will be opened when you say go.

2806.name: Paradise Hotel Room 1
description: You stand inside one of the rooms of the hotel.  The entire room is
very well dressed in furniture and paintings.  A large bed big enough
for three sits next to large windows overlooking the tropical island.
A large oak desk stands again one wall, opposite a large vanity mirror
and dresser.  Curtains hang down from the bed and windows, and
everything looks so tropical.

2758.name: The Beach Walk [South Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.  To the south a large boat house stands.

2805.name: Paradise Hotel Room 3
description: You stand inside one of the rooms of the hotel.  The entire room is
very well dressed in furniture and paintings.  A large bed big enough
for three sits next to large windows overlooking the tropical island.
A large oak desk stands again one wall, opposite a large vanity mirror
and dresser.  Curtains hang down from the bed and windows, and
everything looks so tropical.

2803.name: Paradise Hotel Room 6
description: You stand inside one of the rooms of the hotel.  The entire room is
very well dressed in furniture and paintings.  A large bed big enough
for three sits next to large windows overlooking the tropical island.
A large oak desk stands again one wall, opposite a large vanity mirror
and dresser.  Curtains hang down from the bed and windows, and
everything looks so tropical.

2761.name: The Boat House
description: You stand within the boat house, which is a massive structure that
holds boats and airships alike.  The building is built off in the
waters around the area, so boats can enter them.

2762.name: Bay 2
description: You stand to one side of the boat house, a large bay filled with
water is what is in here, nothing more.

2726.name: Among the Trees
description: The rain forest stretches out before you.  An {Gemer{gal{^d g{Gree{gn {GCano{^p{Gy{0
of leaves can be see far up above you, blocking out all of the sun's
rays and making it almost impossible to see.  Makou lights are
positioned on some of the brownish gray trees that make up pretty much
all of the terrain, allowing for some sight, or at least enough to see
who your supposed to tag.  The forest floor is filled with leaves and
feces of the animals that still live here, and the air smells dank and
wet.  Every few minutes or so the sky will let loose and spray water
everywhere, since this is indeed a rain forest, and it lives up to its
name.  The calls of birds can be heard up in the trees ,and the sounds
of crickets is in your ears perpetually as you trudge through the
leaves, cracking and crinkling as you walk.

2744.name: Among the Trees
description: The rain forest stretches out before you.  An {Gemer{gal{^d g{Gree{gn {GCano{^p{Gy{0
of leaves can be see far up above you, blocking out all of the sun's

name.  The calls of birds can be heard up in the trees ,and the sounds
of crickets is in your ears perpetually as you trudge through the
leaves, cracking and crinkling as you walk.

2749.name: Upstairs in the Hotel
description: The second floor for of the hotel.  Doors stand on either side of
the wall, north and south.  Each room numbered.  The hallway' contines
east.  To the north the door reads "Room 1".  To the south the door
reads "Room 2".

2742.name: Among the Trees
description: The rain forest stretches out before you.  An {Gemer{gal{^d g{Gree{gn {GCano{^p{Gy{0
of leaves can be see far up above you, blocking out all of the sun's

leaves, cracking and crinkling as you walk.

2791.name: The Beach Walk [West Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2771.name: The Beach Walk [East Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2714.name: A Sunny Dirt Path
description: You are walking down a small dirt path on Paradise Island.  You can
hear the relaxing sound of waves crashing into the golden shore, and
the roar of the crowd already swimming and sun bathing on the beach.
Palm trees are scattered along the golden sand near the path, and
there is a smallish classy looking building to your north with a sign
that says, "Vince's Casino.  " To your east the path continues to
other buildings that look quite promising for entertainment value, and
to your west is the center of Paradise Island.

2781.name: The Beach Walk [North Side]
description: All around you the tropical air flows past you, the palm trees sway
in the wind a tad.  The blue waters of the Sea of Swords laps up
against the ocean beach.  The sandy path continues its course around
the island.

2711.name: Paradise Island Pub
description: You walk into a smoke filled room.  Here is the bar of the hotel,
filled with people watching the local fights on an orb.  The bar is
filled with all kinds of tourists.  The entire bar is decked out in
tropical type stuff, fake plam trees, bamboo walls.  The floor is
filled with people sitting at round tables, having a drink.  The bar
is also jammed with people.

2728.name: Among the Trees

2724.name: A Sunny Dirt Path
description: The path continues along the shore of the island.  To the east a
large boat house stands.  To the north the jungle gets thicker as the
rain forest of the island stands.  You see a large sign that reads
"FREEZE TAG" to the north.  The hotel and beach is to the west.

2706.name: The Beach of Paradise Island
description: {YGolden sands spread out in each direction, people, lay in it and enjoy
it.  All around you, people are having fun.  Some lay on towels, some in
chairs and even some in the water.  The sands look hot, but relaxing, the
wind picks up a little and it blows around your feet, a rough, relaxing
feel.  {x

2718.name: A Game Room
description: You have entered another game room.  The slot machines here all
proclaim that you could be the next big winner, if you strike the
jockpot.  A sign with Vince's smiling face and a palm tree with gold
hanging from it is painted above the largest machine you've ever seen.
Many people flock around it, gasping at its sheer glory.  It is the
grand prize slot machine with a jockpot of unimaginable money.
Smaller, silver slot machines with plastic monkeys hanging from them
line the edges of the walls in rows, and the room is jam packed with
people.  West is back to the center of the game rooms.

2750.name: Among the Trees
description: The rain forest stretches out before you.  An {Gemer{gal{^d g{Gree{gn {GCano{^p{Gy{0
of leaves can be see far up above you, blocking out all of the sun's
rays and making it almost impossible to see.  Makou lights are
positioned on some of the brownish gray trees that make up pretty much

2801.name: Paradise Hotel Room 4
description: You stand inside one of the rooms of the hotel.  The entire room is
very well dressed in furniture and paintings.  A large bed big enough
for three sits next to large windows overlooking the tropical island.
A large oak desk stands again one wall, opposite a large vanity mirror
and dresser.  Curtains hang down from the bed and windows, and
everything looks so tropical.

2712.name: Upstairs in the Hotel
description: The second floor for of the hotel.  Doors stand on either side of
the wall, north and south.  Each room numbered.  The hallway continues
in either direction.  The door to the north reads "Room 3".  The door
to the south reads "Room 4".

2700.name: a dock worker~
2700.room_name: A dock worker stands here, helping people off the sailing ships and airships.

2704.name: A Casino Worker~
description:
Hes a human male and is wearing a green suite.  He greets you
pleasantly and offers to dice with you.

F par ABCDEFGHIJK
2704.room_name: A worker for the Casino stands here offering to roll dice with you at a table.

2708.name: Hotel Clerk~
description:
A nice looking man stands behind the hotel counter smiling at you. 
He waits to take your order..  
 
(MPROG NOTICE)
At Paradise Island the Hotel Rooms are free, because this is a place
to relax.  You can get private rooms now, and people can't get another
key unless you log off or the key rots.  All you go to do is the
following....
 
1. Ask for a room, 1-6.  Type say 'room 1' for room 1, etc.
2. The mob will check, and if the room is taken, he'll say so.
3. Sac the key when done.
4. Say 'available' to see which rooms are free.
subroutines:
M speech 2794 room 1~
M speech 2795 room 2~
M speech 2796 room 3~
M speech 2797 room 4~
M speech 2798 room 5~
M speech 2799 room 6~
M speech 2800 available~

description:

green trousers and a baggy t-shirt with the Paradise Logo.  A Name tag
in the middle of his shirt reads, Frank.
